article_title: Castlight Health IPO from the Guy Who Brought You Healthcare.gov
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: Todd Park, the White House tech whiz and a leader of the effort to build, then fix, healthcare.gov, is also a co-founder of new IPO candidate Castlight Health. They're both bold plays to fix health care. And they are both tough sells.
article_metadata.author: Tim Mullaney

og.description: Todd Park, the White House tech whiz and a leader of the effort to build, then fix, healthcare.gov, is also a co-founder of new IPO candidate Castlight Health. They're both bold plays to fix health care. And they are both tough sells.
